run: sudo fdisk -l    look at the partitions and types
then run: sudo blkid     to get the IDs
then read fstab to make sure its all singing right
just check the partitions on each disk and how the system is laid out
fstab uses usids now so you will need to make a note of the blkids you read and which partition they relate to and what file system it uses
